## decodeFirstRune() function

Decode the first complete UTF-8 character from a byte array. Returns the character and its byte length, or null if incomplete.

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function decodeFirstRune(bytes: Uint8Array, offset?: number): [string | null, number];
```

## Parameters

</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

bytes


</td><td>

Uint8Array


</td><td>

Byte array to decode


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

offset


</td><td>

number


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Start offset (default 0)


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

\[string \| null, number\]

Tuple of \[character, byteLength\] or \[null, 0\] if incomplete
